text: Muhayer Oktay (born 28 April 1999) is a German-born Turkish footballer who plays for Beşiktaş. ==Club career== On 17 January 2019, Oktay joined Süper Lig outfit Beşiktaş with a four-and-a-half-season-long contract from German side Fortuna Düsseldorf. On 23 August 2019, Oktay made his Süper Lig debut at 2019–20 season week 2 home-encounter against Göztepe, ended 3-0 in favour of Beşiktaş. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at TFF * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Hagen Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkey youth international footballers Category:German footballers Category:German people of Turkish descent Category:Beşiktaş J.K. footballers Category:Süper Lig players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Muhayer Oktay
